tooltip.marginH: Margin horizontally, relative to the screen width
tooltip.marginV: Margin vertically, relative to the screen height
tooltip.drivername: Set the driver's full name to display
tooltip.driverregion:
Set the driver's nationality, use country code ISO 3166-1 alpha-2
e.g. 'fr' for France
tooltip.useOffset:
When horizontal position is set to Center, switch on 
to center the circular elements in this dashboard
tooltip.showLocalBest: Show the cursor of the local best time on the progress bar, and the difference to it
tooltip.showDeltaTime: Show the time difference to local best time at the top of dashboard
tooltip.showAdditionalInfo: Show additional information such as Speed, RPM, LapTime, etc.
